string string localPath = context.Data.LocalPath; // Split the local path (the Substring method is to remove the first '/') string[] pathValues = localPath.Substring(2).Split('/'); // Retrieve the filename string filename = pathValues[1]; // Set the file adapter metadata property "Name", so the file // adapter will use the filename when writing to the file system
